snippet: Recent federal rulings should and will motivate responsible sovereign debtors and private creditors to resolve their differences at the negotiating table, and not in the courtroom, the author contends.
abstract: Recent federal rulings should and will motivate responsible sovereign debtors and private creditors to resolve their differences at the negotiating table, and not in the courtroom, the author contends.

headline.main: Courts Are Right to Hold Argentina to Equal Debt Treatment
